title: Magnet Sphere
summaries: The Magnet Sphere is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that casts a glowing, slow-moving cyan sphere, which travels in a straight line, unimpeded by liquids or other non-solid obstacles in its path and (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) can bounce off tiles. The sphere will rapidly shoot instantaneous, non-piercing beams at the closest enemy as it travels through the air, and disappears if it has been in the air for more than 15 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 11 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) seconds or has traveled 52 tiles. If the player casts another sphere while there is already one in the air, the previous one will fade away. The Magnet Sphere has a 1/300 (0.33%) / 599/90000 (0.67%) chance of being dropped by Blue Armored Bones, Rusty Armored Bones, and Hell Armored Bones in the post-Plantera Dungeon.

Its best modifier is Ruthless. The Mythical modifier provides the widest array of stat bonuses, but the only stats that improve damage output are damage and critical chance. Switching to a different magic weapon causes existing projectiles to use that weapon's critical chance instead, meaning that the Magnet Sphere's DPS is optimized with the Ruthless modifier when used in the intended way.
